name: Bogs Sweetpea Ankle Rain Boots - Women's
description: Rainy days are infinitely better with dry feet. With their sleek lines and fabric-like rubber outer, these boots mean your rainwear doesn’t look like rainwear. And, they have rebound tech in the soles for comfortable walking.Bogs Max-Wick™ pulls moisture away from the foot and DuraFresh helps naturally control odours.Rebound cushioning under heels and contoured EVA footbeds provide all-day comfort.Nylon shank provides stability and support.Non-marking rubber outsole keeps things under control.
